verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus Christ, Jesus Christ, Every morning You greet me, God’s pure light, my delight, You are happy to meet me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Strong in my spirit you bloom and grow, Bloom and grow forever. Jesus Christ, Jesus Christ, You’re my bridegroom forever.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord Most High, how can I, Thank You for all You give me, Your dear Son, left His home, Gave up heaven to love me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Over and over I’ll spread the news, There’s no greater story, Once He came bearing shame, Soon He’ll come in His glory.{/lang-eng}
